Disclaimer

The information displayed in this application comes directly from the official City of Milwaukee web site*. That is, the application’s information is only as reliable as their information. Causes for incorrect information may be due to:

  • Incorrect information provided by the city web site*
  • The city web site not being accessible.
  • The web site changing, thus “breaking” the manner in which this application uses the web site.
  • Other changes beyond the control of this application.

    • The City of Milwaukee’s “Web & Email Policies” as of August 2016 states:

    The City of Milwaukee is committed to proactively publish data in a structured standardized machine readable format to improve provision of services, increase transparency and access to public information, and enhance coordination and efficiency among departments, partner organizations and citizens.

    The information retrieved and viewed within this application is intended to improve consumption of public information, and thus meets these policies.

    * - The application currently uses this page for retrieving information: http://city.milwaukee.gov/mpw/divisions/operations/environmental/sanitation/GarbageRecyclingSchedules.htm

Milwaukee DPW has an online service request form that allows service requests for missed garbage/recycling collection, missing/damaged carts, special collection, street sweeping, etc.
The links to make a service request are below. All requests go through the DPW web site!

The City of Milwaukee can send text notifications with the following information:
 
 • Garbage and recycling pickup
 • Parking restrictions during snow events
 • Street sweeping
 • Amber alerts
 • Aldermanic news
 
 Additionally, you can sign up for email notification of crime activity in your neighborhoods, or in any area of Milwaukee. They include crime categories such as aggravated assault, robbery, burglary, vehicle theft, theft, arson, criminal damage to property and locked vehicle entry.
See this page for more details: \n http://city.milwaukee.gov/enotify
